topic.title: Can i save/archive a cloned zite data/users directory and bring it back online?
topic.body:
im trying to clone this zite - http://127.0.0.1:43110/Sites.ZeroNetwork.bit/ - and all its data. when its cloned it has nothing in data/users of course, but i would like to keep all the data. i've tried the following:
- copying the db file but it didnt get publish
- copy all the data entries (site, site_star etc) into one data.json but the db generated empty
is it possible to do it without manually adding all the sites?

1551712265_1C1gnFcVv9J9kUjF4odDMRYcEWVPJ.body:
> [quantumworld](#comment_296_1AdWXZdPUimpXoGNXUBde2CHR7gLf4onxE): A full working copy of that site is in your Data directory. */ZeroNet/data/

yes i know but the data/users/* is not copied i.e the data is not copied, im intrested in cloning the data as well, apart from the site itself
